name: Grilled Salmon
steps: Preheat grill to medium heat.
Brush salmon fillets with olive oil.
Season with salt, pepper, and garlic.
Grill salmon for 6-8 minutes on each side until opaque.
Serve with a squeeze of fresh lemon.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Boil pasta in salted water according to package instructions.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and grated parmesan cheese.
Cook guanciale in a skillet until crispy.
Drain pasta and reserve some pasta water.
Toss pasta with guanciale, egg mixture, and some reserved pasta water.
Season with black pepper and serve.

name: Chicken Curry
steps: Saut√© onions, garlic, and ginger in a large pot.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
Stir in curry powder and tomatoes, cooking until soft.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice.

name: Paneer Tikka
steps: In a bowl, mix yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, spices, and lemon juice.
Marinate paneer cubes in the mixture for 1 hour.
Thread paneer onto skewers.
Grill or bake at high heat until charred.
Serve with chutney and lemon wedges.
